SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 1075 Laboratory Technician Posts
Harshitha / All Government Jobs / Aug 25, 2025, 14:30 IST
 National Health Mission
 1,075 Jobs |  Posted On : 25-Aug-2025 |  Bihar |  Salary : 15,000 to 24,000




FOLLOW

The State Health Society, Bihar (SHS Bihar) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 1075 Laboratory Technician Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 12th, DMLT, B.Sc., and M.Sc. can apply for the SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, selection process, application fee, salary, and how to apply for these posts before the deadline. The application dates have already begun.




If you are more interested in Government Jobs, candidates can also apply for jobs in Bihar

SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 Eligibility Criteria:
Name of the Posts	Vacancies	Education
Senior Laboratory Technician	07	DMLT, B.Sc, M.Sc
Laboratory Technician	1068	12th, DMLT

SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 Age Limit:

The minimum age limit: 21 Years.
The maximum age limit: 37 Years.

Age Relaxation:

For BC, EBC candidates: 03 Years.
For SC/ST candidates: 05 Years.

SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 Selection Process:

The selection process is based on the

Computer-Based Test.
Interview.

SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 Application Fee:

The application fee

For SC/ST/Female candidates: Rs. 125/-.
For UR/EWS/BC candidates: Rs. 500/-.

SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 Pay Scale:

The minimum salary: Rs. 15,000/- per month.
The maximum salary: Rs. 24,000/- per month.
How to Apply for the SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025:
Go to the official website.
Visit the SHS Bihar Recruitment 2025 notification.
Read the instructions carefully and check the eligibility criteria.
Fill out the application form without any mistakes.
Pay the application fee (if needed).
Attach the required documents to the filled application form.
Submit the filled application form before the last date.
Download & take a printout of the filled application form for further use.

Important Dates:

Starting date	01-09-2025
Closing date	15-09-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here
Apply Online	Click Here
Join Whatsapp Group	Join Now
Join on Telegram	Join Now
